official_title: A bill to amend the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 in order to increase the Federal share of the cost of certain railroad highway crossing demonstration projects.

summary.text: Amends the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 to increase the Federal share of the cost of specified railway highway crossing demonstration project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 in order to increase the Federal share of the cost of certain railroad highway crossing demonstration projects.
